Package org.cleverbus.core.common.route

Defines base class for route definition and few basic routes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EndpointRegistry Contract for getting endpoints overview.
 

Class Summary
EndpointRegistryImpl Default implementation of EndpointRegistry.
PingRoute Route definition for ping service - listens to /http/ping url.
RouteBeanNameGenerator BeanNameGenerator implementation for bean classes annotated with the @CamelConfiguration annotation.
RouteConstants Common route constants.
SpringWsUriBuilder Implementation of WebServiceUriBuilder for using Spring WS component.
VersionRoute Route definition for version service - listens to /http/version url.
 

Package org.cleverbus.core.common.route Description

Defines base class for route definition and few basic routes.
